titles.title: Wind, Wind Blow On Me. Wind, Wind Set Me Free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wind, wind blow on me. Wind, wind set me free.
Wind, wind, my Father, send, the blessed Holy Spirit.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus told us all about you, how He could not live without You,
with His blood the power bought, to help us live the life He taught.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When we're weary, You console us, when we're lonely, You enfold us,
When in danger, You uphold us, blessed Holy Spirit.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When unto the church you came, it was not in Your own
But in Jesus' name, Jesus Christ is still the same.
He sends the Holy Spirit.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Set us free to love our brothers. Set us free to live for others.
Then the world the Song might see, and Jesus' name exalted be.
